subject: ControlUp alert mail - Advanced Trigger -  Logical Disk: C:\ on Computer: DESDN01082.bitzer-bak.biz.
body:
This is an automated alert from ControlUp, which you requested to receive using an incident trigger. 

	
The monitored resource has matched the conditions specified below.


     Organization Name: Bitzer


     Folder name: bitzer\oi-ibs\backup infrastructure\infrastructure


     Reported by: ControlUp Monitor Service on DESDN01126


     Trigger name: OI-IBS Backup Machines: Less 15 GB AND less 10 Percent <controlup://incidents/OI-IBS Backup Machines: Less 15 GB AND less 10 Percent> 


     Resource name: Logical Disk: C:\ on Computer: DESDN01082.bitzer-bak.biz. <controlup://incidents/Logical Disk: C:\ on Computer: DESDN01082.bitzer-bak.biz.> 


     Resource type: LogicalDisks


     Stress Level: Advanced


     Incident timestamp (UTC +1 W. Europe Standard Time): 11/13/2025 2:26:22 PM


     Columns involved in this incident:


      Column: % Free Space <controlup://incidents/% Free Space> 


      Value is 13%


      On (UTC +1 W. Europe Standard Time): 11/13/2025 2:21:22 PM


      Threshold crossed: 8%


      Column: Free Space <controlup://incidents/Free Space> 


      Value changed from 10 (GB) to 9.9 (GB)


      On (UTC +1 W. Europe Standard Time): 11/13/2025 2:21:22 PM


      Threshold crossed: 10 (GB)


      Column: Machine <controlup://incidents/Machine> 


      Value is DESDN01082


      On (UTC +1 W. Europe Standard Time): 11/13/2025 2:21:22 PM


      Threshold crossed: The column has more than one threshold.

. 
In order to configure which e-mail alerts you receive, please open ControlUp and edit the settings for the trigger specified above.
